caption:
In the photograph, two people are engaging in fishing activities by the waterfront. On the left side of the image, a person is seated on the ground, focusing on assembling or handling fishing equipment. This individual is dressed in a brown sweater and dark pants. To the right, another individual stands while interacting with a portable, cylindrical object that appears to be a fishing reel or similar equipment; this person is clad in a red jacket and a patterned headscarf, and is bending over to perhaps fix something at the base where a bag also sits.

The background features a shimmering body of water under bright sunlight, creating a visually striking reflection on its surface. The shoreline is rugged with scattered rocks. The environment suggests a serene and peaceful setting, primarily devoted to the leisurely activity of fishing. The overall mood conveyed is tranquil and focused, set in an outdoor, natural landscape.
title: California--zmudowski state park
